mapper.select: SELECT A.BOARD_NO , A.ESTER_EMPNO , A.BOARD_NM , A.BKMK , B.COCNR_EMPNO FROM TB_TODO_BOARD A, TB_BOARD_COCNR B WHERE A.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND B.COCNR_EMPNO = #{cocnrEmpno} ORDER BY A.BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT A.BOARD_NO AS boardNo , A.COCNR_EMPNO AS cocnrEmpno , C.FILE_COURS AS fileCours , C.FILE_NO AS fileNo , C.FILE_NM AS fileNm FROM TB_BOARD_COCNR A , TB_EMPL B , TB_FILE C WHERE A.COCNR_EMPNO = B.EMPNO AND B.FILE_NO = C.FILE_NO
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(BOARD_NO),0) + 1 FROM TB_TODO_BOARD
INSERT INTO TB_TODO_BOARD (BOARD_NO , ESTER_EMPNO , BOARD_NM , BKMK , WRTING_DE) VALUES(#{boardNo} , #{esterEmpno} , #{boardNm} , 'N' , SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT A.BOARD_NO AS boardNo , A.COCNR_EMPNO AS cocnrEmpno , B.NM AS cocnrNm , D.NM AS cocnrOfcpsNm , C.FILE_COURS AS fileCours , C.FILE_NM AS fileNm FROM TB_BOARD_COCNR A, TB_EMPL B, TB_FILE C, TB_UNITY_CODE D WHERE A.COCNR_EMPNO = B.EMPNO AND B.FILE_NO = C.FILE_NO AND D.CODE = B.OFCPS_CODE AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
SELECT BOARD_NO , CARD_MENU_NO , CARD_SJ , CARD_ORDR FROM TB_CARD_MENU ORDER BY CARD_ORDR
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(CARD_MENU_NO),0)+1 AS cardMenuNo , NVL(MAX(CARD_ORDR),0)+1 AS cardOrdr FROM TB_CARD_MENU
INSERT INTO TB_CARD_MENU (BOARD_NO , CARD_MENU_NO , CARD_SJ , CARD_ORDR) VALUES (#{boardNo} , #{cardMenuNo} , #{cardSj} , #{cardOrdr})
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO AS boardNo , CARD_MENU_NO AS cardMenuNo , CARD_SJ AS cardSj , CARD_ORDR AS cardOrdr FROM TB_CARD_MENU WHERE CARD_MENU_NO = #{cardMenuNo}

SELECT CARD_MENU_NO AS cardMenuNo , BOARD_NO AS boardNo , CARD_NO AS cardNo , CARD_NM AS cardNm , WRTER_EMPNO AS wrterEmpno , CARD_CN AS cardCn , FILE_NO AS fileNo , TO_CHAR(WRITNG_TM, 'YYYY-MM-dd') AS writngTm , TO_CHAR(CARD_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-dd') AS cardEndDt , UPDT_EMPNO AS updtEmpno , UPDT_TM AS updtTm FROM TB_CARD ORDER BY CARD_NO

SELECT CARD_MENU_NO AS cardMenuNo , BOARD_NO AS boardNo , CARD_NO AS cardNo , CARD_NM AS cardNm , WRTER_EMPNO AS wrterEmpno , CARD_CN AS cardCn , FILE_NO AS fileNo , TO_CHAR(WRITNG_TM, 'YYYY-MM-dd') AS writngTm , UPDT_EMPNO AS updtEmpno , TO_CHAR(UPDT_TM, 'YYYY-MM-dd') AS updtTm , TO_CHAR(CARD_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-dd') AS cardEndDt FROM TB_CARD WHERE CARD_NO = #{cardNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(ANSWER_NO),0)+1 FROM TB_CARD_ANSWER
INSERT INTO TB_CARD_ANSWER (CARD_MENU_NO , CARD_NO , BOARD_NO , ANSWER_NO , WRTER_EMPNO , WRITNG_TM , UPDT_EMPNO , UPDT_TM , ANSWER_CN) VALUES(#{cardMenuNo} , #{cardNo} , #{boardNo} , #{answerNo} , #{wrterEmpno} , SYSDATE , #{wrterEmpno} , SYSDATE , #{answerCn})
mapper.select: SELECT CARD_MENU_NO AS cardMenuNo , CARD_NO AS cardNo , BOARD_NO AS boardNo , ANSWER_NO AS answerNo , WRTER_EMPNO AS wrterEmpno , WRITNG_TM AS writngTm , UPDT_EMPNO AS updtEmpno , TO_CHAR(UPDT_TM, 'YYYY-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') AS updtTm , ANSWER_CN AS answerCn FROM TB_CARD_ANSWER WHERE ANSWER_NO = #{answerNo}

SELECT A.CARD_MENU_NO AS cardMenuNo , A.CARD_NO AS cardNo , A.BOARD_NO AS boardNo , A.ANSWER_NO AS answerNo , A.WRTER_EMPNO AS wrterEmpno , A.WRITNG_TM AS writngTm , A.UPDT_EMPNO AS updtEmpno , TO_CHAR(A.UPDT_TM, 'YYYY-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') AS updtTm , A.ANSWER_CN AS answerCn , B.FILE_NO AS photoNo , C.FILE_COURS AS photoCours , C.FILE_NM AS photoNm FROM TB_CARD_ANSWER A, TB_EMPL B, TB_FILE C WHERE A.WRTER_EMPNO = B.EMPNO AND B.FILE_NO = C.FILE_NO ORDER BY A.ANSWER_NO ASC
